greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle t(n,m) read by rows: t(n,m) = binomial(n,m)*3^m if m <= n/2, else t(n,m) = t(n,n-m).
formula: t(n,m) = binomial(n,m)*3^m if 0 <= m <= n/2, t(n,m) = binomial(n,m)*3^(n-m) if n/2 < m <= n.
maple: A144470 := proc(n,m) if m <= floor(n/2) then binomial(n,m)*3^m ; else procname(n,n-m) ; end if; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 03 2011
mathematica: f[n_, m_] = If[m <= Floor[n/2], m, n - m]; Table[Table[Binomial[n, m]*3^f[n, m], {m, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[%]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 09 2008
